title: Stop, Drop & Frisk...
itunes:title: Stop, Drop & Frisk...
description:
TUE 9/27 - On the heels of Trump & Clinton's first debate, The Breakfast Club gets into a little back & forth of their own on the "Stop & Frisk" policy. Where's Lester Holt when you need him? Do we need him...?
